Powerful story my pastor told yesterday of Pastor and Gold Star Dad Arthur Craig & his heroic son SSG Brian T. Craig.

We are deeply grateful for his sacrifice, and to Brian and everyone who has given the last full measure for our Nation, we say Thank You! https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JdGQco28C5Y

RT @SheriffChody I was truly humbled to attend the Sun City Memorial event alongside some of Wilco’s finest & my son. I also had the distinct pleasure of introducing the guest speaker @SenTedCruz as we honored those who sacrificed for our freedom. Vets from the Korean War to present in attendance http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D7lsyj1W0AEA42O.jpg http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D7lsyj1XkAIdIWq.jpg

RT @SecPompeo The Cuban regime may have released activist Eduardo Cardet after three years of unjust imprisonment, but regime-imposed restrictions mean he’s still not free. The U.S. applauds Cardet’s courageous efforts to promote fundamental freedoms for the people of #Cuba. #JailedForWhat http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D7nvNSOW4AA8sUq.jpg

My three older brothers all joined the military. We were lucky to get them back home. #MemorialDay is a reminder not only of the sacrifices our service members make, but of the responsibility we have to honor our promises to our service members, our veterans, and their families. http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1133156853410672642/img/D2G2J1FrPCW0komz.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1133156853410672642/vid/320x320/RbM89uqlYI-HPUlE.mp4?tag=12

Proud to stand with my fellow Democrats to honor our American heroes on #MemorialDay. We may never be able to repay the fallen for the sacrifices they've made. But today, we remember their lives and their stories and carry on their mission to keep our country free. https://twitter.com/votevets/status/1132946340428886016 QT @votevets We asked Dem presidential candidates to honor the true meaning of today. Anyone who wants to be Commander-in-Chief should follow her lead. #Memorialday

6,997 service members have died in service to our country since 9/11. Today, we grieve alongside their families. And we honor them by upholding our promises to our veterans when they come home, and by fighting to bring these forever wars to a close. https://medium.com/@teamwarren/a-meaningful-memorial-day-5d41ace15d28
@beautifullyvgn Great, and now I'll be smiling all day. See how that works?! Thanks for your support!

It is because they fearlessly defended our liberty that we are able to stand here today in our beloved nation that serves as a beacon of freedom to all. #MemorialDay #MemorialDay2019

As we reflect on the sacrifices made, let's acknowledge that our fallen heroes were also people with full lives. They had families, loved ones, hobbies, dreams. Let's remember their names on #MemorialDay. Read about them here: https://thefallen.militarytimes.com/

Today all across Texas and our great nation we pause to honor the brave sacrifices of our military members as they continue to lead and serve at home and abroad. We also unite as Americans to pay tribute to those who gave their lives while serving our country. #MemorialDay http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D7k32XVW4AIK4WU.jpg

The for-profit bail industry makes over $2 billion every year preying off the plight of the poor.

Only two nations even allow for-profit bond companies to exist: The United States and the Philippines. It is time to end this international embarrassment and abolish cash bail.

RT @AmbJohnBolton Interim President Juan Guaido and the people of Venezuela continue to overcome Maduro’s efforts to halt the march towards prosperity and democracy. On Memorial Day, we honor the brave men and women who gave their lives for our country and the families who lost loved ones.

Today, we reaffirm a grateful nation’s commitment to everyone who has served and to their families.

#MemorialDay2019

5 Principles in the Green New Deal:
1. Go Big
2. Be Specific
3. Set Deadlines
4. Let Them Sue (aka, “Don’t Flinch”)
5. Make Floors, Not Ceilings

Awesome breakdown ⬇️ 
https://www.washingtonpost.com/outlook/2019/05/22/five-legal-principles-green-new-deal/?utm_term=.db27b5d0da67

While we honor those who made the ultimate sacrifice, we must also remember our veterans. As the former Chair of the Veterans Affairs Committee, I believe we must strengthen the VA and guarantee that all veterans receive the quality health care they earned.

All three of my big brothers served in the military. I remember waiting by the mailbox with my mother for news—how days with a letter were extra sunny. My brothers made it home safely, but many service members did not. On this #MemorialDay and every day, we honor their sacrifice. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D7k4nc1XoAASdGX.jpg

Note to press: It’s sloppy to call any + all climate plans “Green New Deal” policies.

Green New Deal policies center jobs + justice in frontline, working communities as we transition our economy+infrastructure.

Not all climate policies are the same.

Many make inequality worse. https://twitter.com/ajenews/status/1133021309817036800 QT @AJENews Congestion tax in New York seen as litmus test for Alexandria Ocasio-Cortez's Green New Deal https://trib.al/CCvBdyF http://pbs.twimg.com/media/D7lM4HrXoAE8Kj_.jpg

This is not a critique of congestion pricing per se, but it’s to say you can’t just tag any random climate policy + call it GND.

Nowhere in the text do we mention congestion pricing.

If you’re a journalist that’s going to report on/talk about the GND, READ THE RESOLUTION.

My dad used to tell me you can never pay someone back—you can only pay it forward. Rarely is that truer than on #MemorialDay. Please, join me today in honoring their memory with a kind thought or deed in service to your fellow countrymen and countrywomen.
